name: Real Flying Snake Attack Simulator: Hunt Wild-Life Animals in Forest
name_original: Real Flying Snake Attack Simulator: Hunt Wild-Life Animals in Forest
description:
Slither through dark forest and slay your prey like a fierce anaconda snake. Enjoy flying snake in the newest 3D game and hunt down enemies like rabbits, humans or birds to satisfy hunger.

Play as deadly flying snake, crawl in a lush tropical forest and kill victims with poisonous venom spit. Become the most feared reptile and jump high to attack on birds nest or wild animals wandering in big 3D jungle environment. Slay victims in the most merciless way imaginable. Be a deadliest flying snake and weave through air to prey on critters or slithering worm with sharp fangs. Hunger turned you in angry snake looking for surprise attack on enemies. Enjoy flying snake simulator game in huge open-world environment to spread fear among wild life.

Survive in wildlife against mighty animals and swerve to avoid hostile situation. Kill your target with poison bite and eat to fulfill hunger. Go on rampage against hunters trying to shoot wild animals and angry snakes. Earn rank of scariest predator in mountain jungle, hunting birds from nest and attack rabbits trying to outrun gliding snake. Live upto the fame of chrysopelea family know for venomous spit killing humans and wild animals.


Game Features:
10 thrilling flying snake missions in savanna like forest
Hunt bunny or human hunters & attack bird nest
Realistic mountain jungle with massive open world
Smooth controls for snake gliding and jumping
High quality 3D graphics for immersive gameplay


Kindly give us your feedback in the reviews section so that we may improve our game in future releases.
